data: NEPH / TM Hemodialysis Albumin Transfusion 4day a week for 2 week (Day of Treatment)
Routine, 25% - 100 mL, Qty of Bottles Per Dose: 1, IV, once, T;N, Administer at the start of HD run
Routine, 25% - 100 mL, Qty of Bottles Per Dose: 1, IV, once, T;N, Administer mid HD run
Then Transfuse Albumin 25% - 100 mL, Routine, IV, Start date T;N, Administer mid HD run
Administer - Albumin Transfusion orders are for nurse use only

If the patient exhibits signs or symptoms of a Transfusion Reaction, Print Transfusion Reaction Form from FormFast and follow your transfusion reaction guideline.  Notify provider of the transfusion reaction to obtain further care instructions.
